name: uvx-proxy-local

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run docs:verify
scripts.version: npm run docs:update && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md docs/ README.md
scripts.release: npm run pre-release && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:beta: npm run pre-release && standard-version --prerelease beta && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:alpha: npm run pre-release && standard-version --prerelease alpha && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --tag alpha

author: Your Name
description: 多提供商内网穿透 CLI 工具，支持 Pinggy、Serveo、LocalTunnel 等免费服务，智能回退机制
